headline.main: ALLIES FLOOD AIR WITH PACT NEWS; Radio, Using Every Language of Continent, Exploits Event to Fullest Extent

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Nov. 2 -- News of the Moscow agreement is being pumped by air into Europe at the rate of hundreds of thousands of words each day in every tongue of the Continent as the Allied political offensive, designed to exploit the diplomatic victory to the utmost, rolls forward.
abstract: Ger and Paris radios comment on pact
snippet: LONDON, Nov. 2 -- News of the Moscow agreement is being pumped by air into Europe at the rate of hundreds of thousands of words each day in every tongue of the Continent as the Allied political offensive, designed to exploit the diplomatic victory...

byline.original: By Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
